name: MINDTRAP (itch)
description:
You've been trapped in your own dream... so yo have to go through all the puzzles to get out. Some of them are procedural so gameplay is a little bit different every time. We also use non-Euclidean geometry in one of the levels.

This game was just an experiment to test some stuff out. (It's cool looking and weird).

Controls
  • Use mouse to look around
  • Press W, S, A, D to move
  • Press [SPACE BAR]  to jump
  • Hold [LEFT SHIFT] to sprint
  • Press [ESC] to show in-game menu

Your progress is automatically saved after each level :)

Created by
  • Michał Biernat
  • Anna Hosumbek

Check out my other games HERE!
